The largest weekly increase took place about Whitsuntide, when the registers rose by 104,000. It is noteworthy that the wholly unemployed figure actually shows a slight decrease over the month.(C.) Unemployment in Insured Industries.The latest date for which unemployment figures by industries are available is the 20th June, 1927, at which date the percentage unemployed in Great Britain and Northern Ireland was 8"9, as compared with 8"8 at the 23rd May, 1927, with 14\6 at the 21st June, 1926, and with 11'9 at the 22nd June, 1925. Latest Figures.The latest figure of unemployment published is that for the 11th July, giving the total number on the registers as 1,036,516. This is an increase over the position on the 27th June amounting to 31,903, and a decrease over a year ago of 607,678.ARTHUR STEEL-MAITLAND.Ministry of Labour,July 22, 1927.
